Level 46
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 46
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 10:08 pm:

Stage 46

Another easy stage, just climb all the way up, while dodging the flames and knocking them off to the bottom. After that, jump down from the left and get the key. And if you happen to get stuck as the flames will block the way, commit suicide by going near the flames and return with a second life and do the same process, jumping of from the right and exiting the stage. Easy enough?

By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 10:11 pm:

And I've also checked. If you want to win this stage without losing a life through sheer stupidity, destroy the boxes carefully, and make sure when you are trying to attempt to get the key on the left, DON'T TOUCH any flames on your left (meaning the most bottomost/left flame ) as moving it's position before you got the key would have to result in the "commit suicide" method which I've stated above.
